meta.homeTitle: Fabian Wassermann - Software developer, freelancer, and amateur mountaineer
meta.homeDescription: I’m Fabian, a software developer based in Austria. I’m a freelancer doing everything from simple websites to bigger web applications.
meta.aboutDescription: I’m Fabian Wassermann. I live in Austria, where I build amazing software.
meta.articlesDescription: All of my long-form thoughts on programming, webdesign, and more, collected in chronological order.
meta.projectsDescription: Things I’ve made during my freelance career.

hero.title: Software developer, freelancer, and amateur mountaineer.
hero.description: I’m Fabian, a software developer, specialized in full-stack development, based in Austria. I´m a freelancer doing everything from simple websites to bigger webapplications.

contact.title: You want to contact me?
contact.description: Feel free to send me an email at all time. If you want you can start a conversation by sending me a message.

hero.title: I’m Fabian. I live in Austria, where I build amazing software.

content.p1: Hi there! I am a computer enthusiast with a passion for all things tech. From a young age, I have been fascinated by computers and how they work, which led me to pursue a career in the field. In addition to my love for computers, I also enjoy spending time in the great outdoors, particularly in the mountains. I am an avid sports fan and enjoy participating in a variety of activities.
content.p2: In my professional life, I am a freelancer who specializes in building websites and software. I have experience working on a wide range of projects, from small websites to larger web applications. I am always looking to learn and grow in my field, and I am excited to see where my passion for computers and technology will take me next.

articles.title: Writing on software development, webdesign, and the software industry.
articles.intro: All of my long-form thoughts on programming, webdesign, and more, collected in chronological order.

projects.title: Things I’ve made during my freelance career.
projects.intro: I’ve worked on some little projects over the years but these are the bigger projects that I’m most proud of.

kest.name: KestAustria
kest.description: Website for a Software calculating capital gain tax for Austrians. The website gives an overview over the features.

trElektrotechnik.name: TR Elektrotechnik
trElektrotechnik.description: Professional website for an electrical engineer doing solar, infrared heating, electrical installations and smart home.

hundepension.name: Hundepension Bergparadies
hundepension.description: I created a website for a dog hotel nearby. This is one of my first websites I’ve ever made.

labrador.name: Labrador vom Salzkofelblick
labrador.description: This website is for a dog breeder. They’ve got the sweetest dogs I know.

aatsi.name: AATSI Crypto Indexing
aatsi.description: This website is a demo page for showcasing purposes.

billing.name: Billing Software
billing.description: A software for manage customers and generate offers, delivery notes and invoices.

taxApp.name: Capital Gains Tax Application
taxApp.description: In Austria you have to pay tax on capital gains from stocks, interest and dividend. This app helps to have an overview over broker actions and supports filing tax declarations.

taxApp.name: Tax Application
taxApp.description: All news and updates about the Tax Application I made.

billingSoftware.name: Billing Software
billingSoftware.description: All news and updates to the Billing Software I made for one of my clients.

hero.title: Webdesign and Development
hero.intro: From responsive design to interactive features, I create visually appealing and functional websites tailored to your needs. Elevate your online presence with a user-friendly and engaging website.

whatIUse.title: What I use
whatIUse.description: I also integrate custom code to bring extra functionality and performance when needed.

discover.name: Discover
discover.title: Discover Your Goals and Vision
discover.description: Before designing anything, it's crucial to understand your business, goals, and audience. This step sets the direction for everything that follows — ensuring the final website isn't just beautiful, but effective and aligned with your needs.

items.title: Business Goals
items.text: What should the website achieve? (e.g. sell products, get leads, showcase work)

items.title: Target Audience
items.text: Who is the site for? Understanding their needs helps shape the design and content.

items.title: Content & Pages
items.text: What kind of pages do you need (e.g. Home, About, Services), and what should they say?

items.title: Brand Style or Inspiration
items.text: Do you have a logo, brand colors, or websites you love? This guides the visual direction.

design.name: Design
design.title: Design That Feels Right
design.description: During the design phase, I shape the look and feel of your website. Based on what we uncovered in the discovery step, I plan the layout, structure the content, and bring your brand to life with colors, typography, and visuals that connect with your audience.

example.title: The Art of Fine Jewelry
example.subtitle: Unrivaled craftsmanship, rare gemstones, and timeless design come together in collections that exude sophistication and prestige.

build.name: Build
build.title: Build That Works
build.description: In this phase, I turn the approved design into a fast, responsive website — built to perform smoothly across all devices and tailored to your business needs. Everything is clean, scalable, and ready to grow with you.

items.title: No-code meets custom
items.text: Built in Webflow or Shopify with custom enhancements when needed.

items.title: Clean, maintainable code
items.text: A solid foundation for future growth and features.

launch.name: Launch & Support
launch.title: Smooth Launch. Steady Support.
launch.description: Once everything is tested and approved, we go live. I handle all the setup, optimization, and final checks to make sure your website launches smoothly, performs well, and is ready for real users.

items.title: Smooth, stress-free launch
items.text: I handle setup, testing, and go-live so everything runs perfectly.

items.title: Performance & SEO checks
items.text: Your site is optimized for speed, mobile, and discoverability.

items.title: Support during and after launch
items.text: I'm by your side to make adjustments, answer questions, and ensure everything feels right.
